_description: SRDD-guided layer-specific sigma multipliers for Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct
_source: SRDD scan results from previous experiments
_notes: High error layers (14-17): 40.8-42.7% relative error -> 1.5x sigma
Medium error layers (10-13, 18-21): 37-40% relative error -> 1.2x sigma
Low error layers (0-9, 22-27): 28-37% relative error -> 1.0x sigma (baseline)
